attributes.action: stop letting agents charging exorbitant fees to tenants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Letting agents often charge tenants exorbitant fees for trivial and standard services, for example fees of hundreds of pounds for a contract renewal or credit check. These charges do not reflect the true cost of these services, and are often not clearly indicated to the tenant early in the letting process. These fees also affect the poorer tenant more, as they are fixed charges.

We petition the prime minister to bring in legislation to ban these large charges for standard services. These services should be free, or should only reflect their true cost.
